nodes.text: Carrie Beck is the vice president of animation and live-action development at Lucasfilm Ltd. and a member of the Lucasfilm Story Group. She co-created and produced Star Wars Rebels and LEGO Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures, served as an executive producer for Star Wars: Forces of Destiny and co-created Star Wars Resistance. She also co-produced the seventh and final season of Star Wars: The Clone Wars and the second season of The Mandalorian. Additionally, Beck will serve as an executive producer on the upcoming series Star Wars: The Bad Batch.
